function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inconsistent impact of RH on bioaerosol particle size","Impact":"Uncertainty in understanding bioaerosol behavior in different RH conditions","Mitigation":"Conducting further research to clarify the impact of RH on bioaerosol particle size","Technologies":"Particle size analyzers, environmental chambers","People":"Researchers and scientists studying bioaerosols","Owner":"Research institutions and government agencies"},{"Description":"Lack of consensus on the impact of RH on bioaerosol particle size","Impact":"Difficulty in developing effective strategies to control bioaerosol propagation in different RH conditions","Mitigation":"Collaborative research efforts to reconcile contradictory findings and establish a consensus","Technologies":"Data analysis tools, collaborative research platforms","People":"Scientific community and public health authorities","Owner":"Research organizations and government agencies"}]}
